analysis.key_quote: Please do not convert federal positions to Policy/Career. As a career civil servant (34 years!), I have served faithfully through many administrations.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of career civil servants and their expertise, which suggests a concern about the politicization of civil service and the loss of institutional knowledge. It highlights the value of steady leadership and the risks of prioritizing political loyalty over merit.
